actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to exempt individuals who are 72 years old or older from social security taxes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt individuals who are 72 years of age or older from the social security taxes. Entitles any employee to a refund or credit of any amount deducted from wages before the end of the taxable year in which such employee becomes 72 years of age or older.

titles.title: A bill to exempt individuals who are 72 years old or older from social security taxes.
